feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023
